name: Cochinita Pibil | Sacred Food
description: The “torta de cochinita” is a Yucatecan dish made with a handmade bread stuffed with cochinita pibil. Its flavor is characteristic for the achiote seasoning, sour orange and pork meat baked underground. Traditionally eaten every sunday accompanied by a coke in a glass container. The purchase of this NFT art includes additional material downloadable from the author's official website, get in touch via twitter @davidchanvargas to claim it.
